MAIN_MESSAGE: SP Energy Networks apologise for any inconvenience caused by the power cut affecting customers in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have established there is a fault on our overhead line network due to grounded overhead lines between Kevans and Cultier and we now expect your supply to be restored by 11.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:02pm on Tuesday, 24 November 2020
